description: Contract for outsourced conferencing and operator assisted services. Includes office and medical staff information.
full_summary:
### Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS) Tender

**Tender Details:**
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01014143
* **Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, 31 January 2023 at 13:00 ET
* **Location:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contact:** Eric Vanasse at eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca or 514-607-8519

**Tender Overview:**
Shared Services Canada is seeking a fully outsourced contract to provide Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS), including audio conferencing, web conferencing, and operator assisted services. The services will be provided across two streams: Stream 1, where services are provided by the Vendor's own conferencing platform(s), and Stream 2, where services are provided by the Vendor's resources leveraging the Government of Canada's conferencing platforms.

**Key Requirements:**
The top-ranked bidder will be required to have their Cloud Service Provider's services assessed under the ITSM.50.062 Cloud Security Risk Management prior to Contract Award.

**Notice:**
Note that a portion of the COAS services will be cloud-based, requiring an additional security assessment. Bidders must inform Shared Services Canada about any security assessment they have undergone or are currently undergoing.

**Draft Solicitation Documents:**
SSC intends to post the draft solicitation documents on Buy and Sell prior to December 31, 2022, and plans to offer one 1-on-1 session for questions on or clarifications to the draft documents.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to all qualified vendors under the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
